title: By the King. A proclamation. Charles R. Charles the Second, by the grace of God, King of Scotland, England, France, and Ireland, Defender of the Faith, &c. To all and sundry our good subjects whom these presents do or may concern, greeting: we having, with the advice and consent of our Parliaments, past so many Acts in favour of the Protestant religion, against field-conventicles,...
author: Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Edinburgh, printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His most sacred Majesty. Anno Dom. 1679. Re-printed at London,
